General.Name: Feedback Technology
General.Description: Feedback Technology Corp. manufactures and sells components for semiconductor, LCD, LED, medical, and aerospace industries in Taiwan. The company offers helium leak detectors, MV multi-traps, pureron gas filters, SiC coated susceptors, and silicon boats for vertical furnace; Ion implanter parts, optical components, and stainless steel/AI parts; and electroless nickel plating, optical coating, and anodizing products. It also provides cryo pump, e-chuck, and turbo pump repair/overhaul services; and mechatronics engineering services, as well as by zone and touch panel controller box, PTFE and silicon rubber heating jacket, and HOT N2 heater system integration services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 221, Nioupu South Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30091
